Description:
Reef Resort is a wonderful boutique resort located on a tranquil island in beautiful Vavau and appeals to upmarket clientele who prefer to spend their holidays in private places but want to enjoy high quality facilities, comfort and service.
Only five stunning luxury fales (Tongan bungalows) ensure a maximum privacy.
Our gourmet restaurant provides a panorama view over the turquoise lagoon. To maintain our high culinary standard an international Chef cook is be part of the team.
Markus, a decorated Austrian Chef Cook will discuss with the guests their preferences and source the fresh products from the local market and will indulge our guests with international specialties. We serve breakfast, lunch, freshly baked cake for afternoon tea and a 3 course dinner daily. 
The crystal clear waters provide brilliant visibility and one of the best snorkeling spots in Vavau, the Japanese Gardens, is just off the beach.
Reef Resort is perfectly located for joining whale watching, fishing, diving and other excursions. Located on the remote Kapa Island, Reef Resort Vavau offers bungalow-style accommodation directly opposite the Japanese Coral Garden, a popular snorkelling spot. This secluded property provides complimentary wetsuits and whales may also be seen from the resort during the annual breeding season from July to October.

All rooms at the Reef Resort offer sea views and an outdoor terrace with a seating area. The private bathrooms feature a double vanity and free toiletries.

The on-site gourmet restaurant boasts panoramic lagoon views and serves contemporary Polynesian European food served by the European chef. Changing daily, the menu features fresh produce from the local market, with a focus on seafood.

The property can organise complimentary catamaran or boat trips to the beach and Japanese Coral Garden. Please inform Reef Resort Vavau in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note infants, under the age of 2 stay free of charge. Cots are available for free, however they must be booked in advance. Please use the special request box when booking or contact the property using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Honeymooners receive a free bottle of sparkling wine and a flower bouquet on arrival. If you are honeymooners, please let the property know in advance.

Flexible check in and check out times are available. Please contact the property in advance, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Payments in AUD, EUR or NZD are also accepted.
